text: Reminder: Technical report submission deadline approaching. Ensure timely completion.
Online classes according to Academic Routine of Saturday will be conducted on Tuesday.
Attention students: Classes suspended from 3 PM today due to faculty seminar.
Reminder: Don't forget to submit your final presentation outline by the end of the week.
Join us for a special seminar on the ethical implications of artificial intelligence technologies next Tuesday.
Attention all students: The deadline for submitting your research papers has been extended to May 20.
The final exam schedule for the current semester has been officially released. Please check your emails for details.
Applications for summer internships are now open. Don't miss this opportunity to gain valuable experience!
Welcome to all new students! Orientation sessions will be held next week to help you get acquainted with campus life.
Save the date! The graduation ceremony for the class of 2024 will take place on June 5th at the university stadium.
Faculty members, please mark your calendars for the upcoming faculty meeting scheduled for June 10.
Enjoy your summer break! Classes for the next semester will resume in September. Have a wonderful vacation!
Registration for courses in the upcoming fall semester will open on June 20. Plan your schedule accordingly.
